description: Researches and designs the user interface for the Matrix Flash Loan Arbitrage system

context.currentFocus: Matrix Command Center dashboard design with THE ARCHITECT
recentAnalyses: Analyzed EigenPhi.io dashboard for MEV/arbitrage visualization patterns
Evaluated UI frameworks (React, Vue, Svelte, SolidJS) - recommended React
Designed Matrix Command Center dashboard with 12 components
Completed deep dive into EigenPhi transaction flow visualization
Collaborated with THE ARCHITECT on comprehensive dashboard spec
Created 6 detailed wireframes for all dashboard sections
Designed Matrix Dark color palette and component library
openSuggestions: Implement Sankey-style token flow diagrams like EigenPhi
Add transaction classification badges (arbitrage, sandwich, liquidation)
Create P&L summary cards for each transaction
Build multi-chain selector (ETH, ARB, OP, Base, BSC)
Implement daily MEV report dashboard section
Create interactive graph nodes for address/token details
Set up React + TypeScript + Tailwind project structure

components: Token flow graphs with nodes and edges

colorScheme.accent: Green for profits, red for losses

recommendedStack.charts: Recharts or D3.js for flow diagrams

dashboardComponents.name: Total Profit Card
dashboardComponents.description: Large metric showing cumulative profit with 24h change

history.result: Completed UI framework evaluation, identified EigenPhi as primary inspiration
Documented design patterns, EigenTx features, multi-chain support, and recommended implementation approach

history.action: Collaborated with THE ARCHITECT on Matrix Command Center dashboard
history.result: Created comprehensive wireframes for 6 sections: Overview, Competitor Intelligence, Our Opportunities, Strategy Center, AI Insights, Historical Analysis. Designed component library with Matrix Dark theme.

files: docs/WIREFRAMES.md - 6 detailed wireframes with component library

wireframes.overview: Key metrics, agent health, live opportunity feed, competitor snapshot
wireframes.competitorIntelligence: Leaderboard, watched competitor detail, strategy analysis, AI comparison
wireframes.ourOpportunities: Pending opportunities with confidence, active executions, recent history
wireframes.strategyCenter: Profit thresholds, gas strategy, token pairs, DEX routing, risk controls
wireframes.aiInsights: Recommendations, quick wins, detected patterns, failure analysis
wireframes.historicalAnalysis: Performance charts, detailed metrics, transaction log

designSystem.typography: Inter for UI, JetBrains Mono for data
designSystem.components: Cards, buttons, tables, status indicators defined

collaborations.architect: Database schema, data architecture, API design
